metadata.title: CVE-2021-47486 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: riscv,bpf: Fix potential NULL dereference The bpf_jit_binary_free() functionrequires a non-NULL argument. When the RISC-V BPF JIT fails to converge inNR_JIT_ITERATIONS steps, jit_data->header will be NULL, which triggers aNULL dereference. Avoid this by checking the argument, prior calling thefunction.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
